titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, International Division, Middle East and Africa
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, International Division, Middle East and Africa FA1690

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-12-16 07:20:05 -0500.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, International Division, Middle East and Africa

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by file type, field office, or originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists primarily of field office files, correspondence, program files, and officer's files.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.
